name: CUSTOM Video Grid Socials
liquid_code:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@9/swiper-bundle.min.css">

{%- liquid
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align

  assign items_mt = section.settings.items_mt
  assign items_mt_mobile = section.settings.items_mt_mobile
  assign items_type = section.settings.items_type
  assign items_type_mobile = section.settings.items_type_mobile

  assign columns_row = section.settings.columns_row
  assign columns_gap = section.settings.columns_gap
  assign columns_gap_mobile = section.settings.columns_gap_mobile

  assign item_padding_horizontal = section.settings.item_padding_horizontal
  assign item_padding_vertical = section.settings.item_padding_vertical
  assign item_radius = section.settings.item_radius
  assign item_border_thickness = section.settings.item_border_thickness
  assign item_border_color = section.settings.item_border_color
  assign item_bg_color = section.settings.item_bg_color

  assign video_size = section.settings.video_size
  assign video_size_mobile = section.settings.video_size_mobile

  assign icon = section.settings.icon
  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size
  assign icon_color = section.settings.icon_color
  assign icon_bg_color = section.settings.icon_bg_color
  assign icon_padding = section.settings.icon_padding

  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical

  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_align = section.settings.text_align

  assign slider_nav = section.settings.slider_nav
  assign slider_nav_mobile = section.settings.slider_nav_mobile
  assign slider_nav_size = section.settings.slider_nav_size
  assign slider_nav_size_mobile = section.settings.slider_nav_size_mobile
  assign slider_nav_btn_bg = section.settings.slider_nav_btn_bg
  assign slider_nav_btn_hover_bg = section.settings.slider_nav_btn_hover_bg
  assign slider_nav_border = section.settings.slider_nav_border
  assign slider_nav_border_hover = section.settings.slider_nav_border_hover
  assign slider_nav_icon = section.settings.slider_nav_icon
  assign slider_nav_hover_icon = section.settings.slider_nav_hover_icon

  assign slider_pagination_size = section.settings.slider_pagination_size
  assign slider_pagination_size_mobile = section.settings.slider_pagination_size_mobile
  assign slider_pagination_color = section.settings.slider_pagination_color
  assign slider_pagination_hover_color = section.settings.slider_pagination_hover_color

  assign link_text = section.settings.link_text
  assign link_url = section.settings.link_url
  assign link_custom = section.settings.link_custom
  assign link_font = section.settings.link_font
  assign link_size = section.settings.link_size
  assign link_height = section.settings.link_height
  assign link_align = section.settings.link_align
  assign link_mt = section.settings.link_mt
  assign link_padding_vertical = section.settings.link_padding_vertical
  assign link_padding_horizontal = section.settings.link_padding_horizontal
  assign link_radius = section.settings.link_radius
  assign link_border_thickness = section.settings.link_border_thickness
  assign link_text_color = section.settings.link_text_color
  assign link_text_hover_color = section.settings.link_text_hover_color
  assign link_bg_color = section.settings.link_bg_color
  assign link_bg_hover_color = section.settings.link_bg_hover_color
  assign link_border_color = section.settings.link_border_color
  assign link_border_hover_color = section.settings.link_border_hover_color

  assign hide_arrow = section.settings.hide_arrow

  assign video_size_mobile_value = ''
  if video_size_mobile == 'adapt'
    assign video_size_mobile_value = 'auto'
  elsif video_size_mobile == 'small'
    assign video_size_mobile_value = '20rem'
  elsif video_size_mobile == 'medium'
    assign video_size_mobile_value = '30rem'
  elsif video_size_mobile == 'large'
    assign video_size_mobile_value = '40rem'
  endif

  assign video_size_value = ''
  if video_size == 'adapt'
    assign video_size_value = 'auto'
  elsif video_size == 'small'
    assign video_size_value = '25rem'
  elsif video_size == 'medium'
    assign video_size_value = '40rem'
  elsif video_size == 'large'
    assign video_size_value = '50rem'
  endif
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }

  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ heading_align }};
  }

  .video-social-body-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ items_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
    gap: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}px;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(1, minmax(0px, 1fr));
  }

  /* .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  } */

  .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    padding-bottom: {{ slider_pagination_size_mobile | plus: 15 }}px;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-slide {
    height: auto !important;
  }

  .video-social-item-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    padding: {{ item_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    border-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    border: {{ item_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ item_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
    height: {{ video_size_mobile_value }};
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} video {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
    object-fit: cover;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0px;
  }

  .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} > svg {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 2;
    width: {{ icon_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    padding: {{ icon_padding | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    cursor: pointer;
    background-color: {{ icon_bg_color }};
    color: {{ icon_color }};
    opacity: 0.9;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.05);
  }

  .video-social-item-{{ section.id }}.active .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }} img,
  .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ icon_color }};
  }

  .video-social-content-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px
  }

  .video-social-text-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ text_align }};
  }

  .video-social-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    right: 0;
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    border-top-left-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .video-social-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 39% !important;
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 3;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 1px solid {{ slider_nav_border }} !important;
    width: {{ slider_nav_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ slider_nav_size_mobile }}px !important;
    background: {{ slider_nav_btn_bg }} !important;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 5px !important;
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 5px !important;
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: {{ slider_nav_size_mobile | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    height: {{ slider_nav_size_mobile | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    fill: {{ slider_nav_icon }};
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: 2px;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: -1px;
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border: 1px solid {{ slider_nav_border_hover }} !important;
    background: {{ slider_nav_btn_hover_bg }} !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ slider_nav_hover_icon }} !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
    bottom: 0;
  }

  .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ slider_pagination_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ slider_pagination_size_mobile }}px;
    background: transparent !important;
    border: 1px solid {{ slider_pagination_color }};
  }

  .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    background: {{ slider_pagination_color }} !important;
  }

  .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet:hover {
    border-color: {{ slider_pagination_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-social-link-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ link_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding: {{ link_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ link_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    width: fit-content;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
    font-size: {{ link_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    line-height: {{ link_height }}%;
    color: {{ link_text_color }};
    background-color: {{ link_bg_color }};
    border: {{ link_border_thickness }}px solid {{ link_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ link_radius }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-transform: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-link-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    color: {{ link_text_hover_color }};
    border: {{ link_border_thickness }}px solid {{ link_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ link_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-social-link-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    stroke: {{ link_text_color }};
  }

  .video-social-link-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    stroke: {{ link_text_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-social-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
  }

  .video-social-slider-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .video-social-item-{{ section.id }}:not(.swiper-slide-active) {
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  @media(min-width: 768px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }

    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ items_mt }}px;
    }

    .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ columns_gap }}px;
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ columns_row | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}, minmax(0px, 1fr));
    }

    .video-social-item-{{ section.id }} {
       padding: {{ item_padding_vertical }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ video_size_value }};
    }

    .video-social-btn-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
      padding: {{ icon_padding }}px;
    }

    .video-social-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px
    }

    .video-social-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ slider_nav_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ slider_nav_size }}px !important;
    }

    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ slider_nav_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
      height: {{ slider_nav_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    }

    .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ slider_pagination_size }}px;
      height: {{ slider_pagination_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-link-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ link_size }}px;
      margin-top: {{ link_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ link_padding_vertical }}px {{ link_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-social-slider-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} .video-social-item-{{ section.id }}:not(.swiper-slide-active) {
      pointer-events: all;
    }

    .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: 0px !important;
      margin-right: 0px !important;
      padding-left: 0px !important;
      padding-right: 0px !important;
    }

  }

  @media(min-width: 992px) {
    .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ columns_row }}, minmax(0px, 1fr));
    }
  }
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if link_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-link-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ link_font.family }}, {{ link_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ link_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ link_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if items_type_mobile == 'slider' %}
  <style>
    .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .video-social-slider-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block !important;
    }

    .video-social-slider-desktop-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid !important;
    }

    .video-social-slider-desktop-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .video-social-slider-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if items_type == 'slider' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
     .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }

      .video-social-slider-desktop-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block !important;
      }

      .video-social-slider-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
     .video-social-grid-{{ section.id }} {
        display: grid !important;
      }

      .video-social-slider-desktop-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }

      .video-social-slider-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slider_nav_mobile == 'buttons' %}
  <style>
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
    .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
       display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slider_nav_mobile == 'pagination' %}
  <style>
    .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
       display: flex !important;
    }
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
    .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-bottom: {{ slider_pagination_size_mobile | plus: 20 }}px !important;
    }
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-bottom: 0px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
       display: none !important;
    }
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slider_nav == 'buttons' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
      .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
      .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
      .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slider_nav == 'pagination' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 768px ) {
      .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }

      .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
      .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }

      .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-bottom: {{ slider_pagination_size | plus: 20 }}px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
      .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }

      .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
      .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if link_align == 'center' %}
  <style>
    .video-social-link-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif link_align == 'right' %}
  <style>
    .video-social-link-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div
  class="section-{{ section.id }} video-social-{{ section.id }}"
  style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"
>
  <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings ">
    {% if heading != blank %}
      <h2 class="video-social-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</h2>
    {% endif %}
    <div class="video-social-body-{{ section.id }}">
      <div class="video-social-grid-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          <div class="video-social-item-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="video-social-video-{{ section.id }}">
              {% if block.settings.video != blank %}
                {% if block.settings.poster != blank %}
                  {% assign poster_url = block.settings.poster | image_url %}
                    <video poster="{{ poster_url }}" {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
                {% else %}
                  <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
                {% endif %}
              {% else %}
                {{ 'lifestyle-1' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
              {% endif %}
              <div class="video-social-btn-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if icon != blank %}

        <div class="video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} video-social-mobile-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
            <g id="Left"><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g>
          </svg>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    {% if link_text != blank %}
      <a href="{{ link_url }}" class="video-social-link-{{ section.id }}">
        {{ link_text }}
        {% unless hide_arrow %}
          <svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
            <path d="M3.75 12H20.25" stroke="#120A0A" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
            <path d="M13.5 5.25L20.25 12L13.5 18.75" stroke="#120A0A" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
          </svg>
        {% endunless %}
      </a>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
</div>
<style>
  video img{
    width:100%;
    object-fit:cover;
  }
</style>
              
{% assign col_value_desktop = columns_row | plus: 0 %}
{% assign col_value_tablet = columns_row | times: 0.5 %}
{% assign col_value_tablet = col_value_tablet | round: 0 %}

{% if lazy %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
{% endif %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8.4.7/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>          
              
<script>

  function videoFromSocialinit() {
    {% if lazy %}
      var lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

      window.addEventListener( "LazyLoad::Initialized", function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },false);
    {% endif %}
  
    const currentSection = document.querySelector(`.video-social-{{ section.id }}`);
    if (!currentSection) return;
  
    var isSafari = /^((?!chrome|android).)*safari/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
    const swiperDesktop = new Swiper(`.video-social-slider-desktop-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.video-social-desktop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}`,
        prevEl: `.video-social-desktop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}`,
      },
      pagination : {
        el: `.video-social-desktop-pagination-{{ section.id }}`,
        type: 'bullets',
        clickable: true
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: 1.3,
          spaceBetween: {{ columns_gap_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: {% if section.blocks.size > col_value_tablet %}{{ columns_row | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}.2{% else %}{{ columns_row | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}{% endif %},
          spaceBetween: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: {{ columns_row }},
          spaceBetween: {{ columns_gap }}
        }
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          var slides = this.slides;
          for (var i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
            var video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
            if (i === this.activeIndex) {
              video.play();
              slides[i].classList.add('active');
            } else {
              video.pause();
              slides[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
          }
        }
      }
    });
  
    const swiperMobile = new Swiper(`.video-social-slider-mobile-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 300,
      {% if slider_nav_mobile == "buttons" %}
        allowTouchMove: false,
      {% endif %}
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.video-social-mobile-btn-next-{{ section.id }}`,
        prevEl: `.video-social-mobile-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}`,
      },
      pagination : {
        el: `.video-social-mobile-pagination-{{ section.id }}`,
        type: 'bullets',
        clickable: true
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: 1.3,
          spaceBetween: {{ columns_gap_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: {% if section.blocks.size > col_value_tablet %}{{ columns_row | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}.2{% else %}{{ columns_row | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}{% endif %},
          spaceBetween: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: {{ columns_row }},
          spaceBetween: {{ columns_gap }}
        }
      },
      {% if slider_nav_mobile == "none" or slider_nav_mobile == "pagination" %}
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          var slides = this.slides;
          for (var i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
            var video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
            if (i === this.activeIndex) {
  
            } else {
              video.pause();
              slides[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
          }
        }
      }
      {% endif %}
    });
  
    const items = currentSection.querySelectorAll(`.video-social-item-{{ section.id }}`);
    items.forEach(el => {
      const video = el.querySelector(`.video-social-video-{{ section.id }} video`);
      if (!video) return;
  
      el.addEventListener('click', () => {
        // Store state before operation
        const wasPlaying = !video.paused;
  
        // Pause all videos in this section first
        currentSection.querySelectorAll('video').forEach(v => {
          v.pause();
          v.closest(`.video-social-item-{{ section.id }}`)?.classList.remove('active');
        });
  
        // Toggle the clicked video based on its previous state
        if (!wasPlaying) {
          video.play();
          el.classList.add('active');
        }
      });
    });
  
    {% if slider_nav_mobile == "buttons" %}
      document.querySelector(`.video-social-mobile-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}`).addEventListener('click', function() {
        var currentIndex = swiperMobile.realIndex;
        playVideoAndSetActive(currentIndex);
      });
  
      document.querySelector(`.video-social-mobile-btn-next-{{ section.id }}`).addEventListener('click', function() {
        var currentIndex = swiperMobile.realIndex;
        playVideoAndSetActive(currentIndex);
      });
    {% endif %}
  
    function playVideoAndSetActive(index) {
      var slides = swiperMobile.slides;
      for (var i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
        var video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
        if (i === index) {
          video.play();
          slides[i].classList.add('active');
        } else {
          video.pause();
          slides[i].classList.remove('active');
        }
      }
    }
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', videoFromSocialinit);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', videoFromSocialinit);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', videoFromSocialinit);
  }
</script>

columns_row.label: Columns Per Row
columns_row.description: Slider use this value for slide

slider_nav_mobile.label: Slider Navigation Type - Mobile
slider_nav_mobile.description: If None or Pagination is selected, autoplay when scrolling through slides is not available

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load videos for speed optimisation
